description:
Sanji puts Nami`s beautiful body at risk to save the torso of a Samurai, and Luffy appears to have gained the upper hand in his battle with Ceasar - until the gas bag unleashes something sinister!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Intense Battle! Caesar Exercises His True Power!
Dai Gekisen: Caesar Shin no Nouryoku Hatsudou!
Une bataille acharnée. Les pouvoirs de César !
معركة عنيفة! يكشف سيزار عن قوّته الحقيقيّة!
大激戦 シーザー真の能力発動!
